feature.label: Run Jetty Run Feature
feature.description:
Run web applications in Eclipse using this plugin's embedded Jetty distribution (Jetty 6.1.6).
Changelog --------------------
1.0.1 * Added support for JSPs (issue http://code.google.com/p/run-jetty-run/issues/detail?id=1) * Added servlet dependency (issue http://code.google.com/p/run-jetty-run/issues/detail?id=3) * Fixed dependency issue that prevented the plugin from working in Eclipse 2.2 (issue http://code.google.com/p/run-jetty-run/issues/detail?id=5)
1.0.0 * First version
